title: Little Boat
description: One brave little boat is on a journey to discover the seven seas.One brave little boat is on a journey to discover the seven seas. Setting off into the big, wide world, Little Boat runs into treacherous waters, turbulent tides, and seafaring friends. After all his nautical adventures, our hero finds out that heâ€™s no longer such a little boat.
author: Thomas Docherty
